Sahil Lavingia is the founder of Gumroad, a platform enabling digital creators to sell their work directly to audiences.
Sahil Lavingia is the founder and CEO of Gumroad. He solo-founded Gumroad in 2011 and raised $10M+ from Kleiner Perkins, Lowercase Capital, First Round Capital.
